mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanbaozhishi_name as huanbaozhishiName ,a.huanbaozhishi_photo as huanbaozhishiPhoto ,a.huanbaozhishi_content as huanbaozhishiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huanbaozhishi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huanbaozhishi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanbaozhishiName},'%')
and a.huanbaozhishi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanbaozhishiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
